name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-pdf
description: MCP server for loading and extracting text from PDF files with chunked pagination and interactive viewer

scripts.build:
tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && esbuild server.ts --outfile=dist/server.js --platform=node --external:pdfjs-dist --format=esm --target=node22 --bundle --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" && esbuild main.ts --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --external:./server.js --external:pdfjs-dist --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node
import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --format=esm --target=node22 --bundle
scripts.serve:
esbuild main.ts --outfile=dist/index.js --platform=node --external:./server.js --external:pdfjs-dist --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node
import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --format=esm --target=node22 --bundle --watch
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve'
